entry.title: phac-nml/galaxy_tools
entry.summary:
Contains a set of Galaxy Tools mostly written by the Bioinformatics core at NML

Galaxy Tools maintained by the NML

This repository contains Galaxy tools maintained by Canada's National Microbiology Laboratory.
